description.en: Here you will find the vocabulary from Culture 8 in the Solutions Elementary coursebook, such as "salary", "kit", "league", etc.
description.id: Di sini Anda akan menemukan kosakata dari Culture 8 di Solutions Elementary CourseBook, seperti "Gaji", "Kit", "League", dll.

en.long: an amount of money we receive for doing our job, usually monthly

id.long: Sejumlah uang yang kami terima untuk melakukan pekerjaan kami, biasanya setiap bulan

en.long: a group of sports clubs or players who compete against each other and are put together based on the points they have gained through the season

id.long: sekelompok klub olahraga atau pemain yang bersaing satu sama lain dan disatukan berdasarkan poin yang telah mereka peroleh sepanjang musim

en.long: a group of sports players, their manager, and staff such as a soccer or baseball club

id.long: Sekelompok pemain olahraga, manajer mereka, dan staf seperti sepak bola atau klub baseball

en.long: (in baseball) the act of throwing the ball towards the batter in order to start the game

id.long: (dalam baseball) Tindakan melempar bola ke arah adonan untuk memulai permainan

en.long: a container or case that holds a set of articles or tools

id.long: wadah atau kasing yang menampung satu set artikel atau alat

en.long: someone who strongly supports, admires, or likes a football team or football in general

id.long: Seseorang yang sangat mendukung, mengagumi, atau menyukai tim sepak bola atau sepak bola secara umum
